Your homechoice account brings you the ability to create the home you love while shopping confidently with prices and credit you can afford. Increase your credit limit with longer terms by paying your account regularly. Access your account online to keep an eye on your available credit. Our protection plan will take care of your monthly credit payments if you can't make them due to certain circumstances.
Start shopping today with homechoice credit
  • Step 1: Open an online account
  • Step 2: Tell us about your income and expenses
  • Step 3: Send us proof of income
  • Step 4: Find out how much you can spend
  • Step 5: Start shopping!
